input.sentences: i had to clean my work area today .
i took all the pictures and papers on my desk and taped them to the wall .
and now my wall is decorated .
output.sentences: Keeping a clean organized office is important to Janet.
She makes sure her desk is clean everyday.
The only clutter is her wall of pictures.
She has a lot of stuff on her desk but its all organized.
She also has a lot of books to organize.
